headline: Is L3Harris Technologies (LHX) Fairly Priced After Strong 1-Year Share Price Surge?
summary: If you are wondering whether L3Harris Technologies at around US$346.59 is offering fair value or stretching expectations, you are not alone. This article is built to help you unpack that question clearly. The stock has been relatively flat over the last 30 days at 0.0%, but its 13.8% year-to-date return and 80.5% return over the past year give important context for how the market is currently pricing the company. Recent news around the defense sector, including ongoing focus on government...
